info.name: ROBLOX : Transparency V2
info.description: Theme is being revamped and optimised! I've decided to not discontinue the theme, just remake it better. Theme developed by FCEFEAR. ROBLOX Transparency theme. Makes the page semi-transparent and when used with the Non-Mobile ROBLOX extension will allow for an easier to use ROBLOX website. Please make sure to update this regularly for the best experience. Install this ROBLOX extension and enable the userbar feature for the best experience.
info.additionalInfo: Theme developed by FCEFEAR. Update log: V1 - Published style V2 - Bug fixes V3 - Fixed login page and new login window V4 - Added background options V5 - Added navigation bar opacity options V6 - Added new background, adblocker and navigation bar colors V7 - Fixed develop page text not showing up V8 - Added play button customization, fixed multiple bugs V9 - Attempted fix for adblocker not working without extension, failed - adblocker will not work well without this extension installed. V10 - Fixed various issues V11 - Stopped text showing up on some pages V12 - Fixed comments and added "ago" to time since posted value V13 - Smoothed out layout, including refined tables and better element transitions. V14 - Cleaned up colors on the default profile page. V15 - Added web.roblox support V16 - Fixed friends page not showing up V16 - Fixed play button not working with options V17 - Fixed inventory page layout V18 - Huge update! New buttons, backgrounds and optimizations all across the site. V19 - Fixed the "Edit" and "Build" options on the ... menu V20 - Fixed theme to support https:// V20 - Chat support and profile page fixes, as well as padding error fixes. V21 - Fixed multiple padding issues and URL selector errors. ____________________________________________ V22 - Revamping and optimising style code.

settings.label: Bottom navigation bar color (Or side navigation pane if not using extension)

options.label: I'm not using the extension. Disable this feature.
